title.narrative: F.a: Accelerating the conservation initiatives through the social forestry scheme for livelihood and environment

description.narrative: The project protects mangrove and peat swamp forests by promoting community forestry: by meeting regional forestry authorities, organizing workshops on community forestry practices and reviewing the forest areas of six project villages. The capacity of the communities to manage their village forestry organisations is strengthened by training the village forest management units in management and administration, forest fires prevention and safeguards. The forest areas of the six villages are identified and ma pped by air, nurseries will be established for forest plants and degraded forests will be restored. Villagers capacity to utilize non-timber forest products as alternative sources of income is developed by training the villagers in breeding mud crabs, util ising mangrove fruits and bee-keeping.
